title: Mordekaiser is the best Champion in the game, if you doubt me, watch the video.
body:
Name another champion that can heal allies for this much on such a low cooldown?

Name another champion that can unleash such powerful and inescapable ganks?

Name another champion that can push so quickly with just a little team coordination?

Mordekaiser can do it all, he just needs his allies on the same page.

I made this video to illustrate my point- thanks for watching
